briefTitle: Feasibility of Breast Cancer Risk Evaluation in Women From the General Population
officialTitle: Feasibility of Breast Cancer Risk Evaluation in Women From the General Population
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of women who agreed to measure their risk with personalized surveillance and screening recommendations during the consultation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Woman from 40 to 74 years old
* Understanding the French language

Exclusion Criteria:

Women will not be eligible for study if they are in any of the following situations:

* Cancer active or in the course of treatment type surgery, chemotherapy, or radiotherapy, whether breast or other organ
* Recent diagnosis \<1 year of suspicious or cancerous lesions
* Psychiatric pathology not compatible with the study
* Poor understanding of the French language
